short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A customizable productivity dashboard with clock, notes, changing backgrounds and motivational quotes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate your productivity with MQT, the Multi-Functional dashboard extension with inbuilt notes and audio recorder. This powerful, all-in-one browser add-on enables you to seamlessly create, edit, and organize text notes and audio recordings on your tabs page. Enrich your daily workflow with beautiful backgrounds and motivational quotes, perfect for capturing ideas, to-do lists, and reminders. Stay focused and organized throughout your busy day while enjoying an inspiring and personalized experience. Download now for a more efficient and streamlined workflow!
